title: Graine de Soleil
description: A raw vegan food brunch is offered one Sunday of each month, with entree, main course, vegan cheese and dessert. Reservations made at least 48 hours in advance are mandatory for brunch. Also offers raw food classes on Tuesday or Thursday, and some Saturdays. Check website for dates and subject of class. Owner coaches people how to add more raw food into their diets. In addition holds classes for sprouting, growing wheat grass and more.
